summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue West, from West Smith Street to West Armour Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with property owners' petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 187900, to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
